channel.title: How to release a track with Frontier?
channel.description: I’ve been thinking.I want to make a track with Frontier. I don’t think that’s gonna happened but I hope I’ll find the way.I’m asking @stereofield @anon73773654 and @HYDRANS . Because they made a track with his release.

item.title: How to release a track with Frontier?
item.dc:creator: stereofield
item.description:
Frontier releases exclusive tracks, which means we upload it to our page and do the promotion/distribution/artwork ourselves. If you’d like to submit an unreleased track, email contact@frontiermusic.in or DM me on Discord (chip#0001)

Read full topic
item.source: How to release a track with Frontier?
